scripts.build: mkdir -p vendor/imgly-data onnxruntime-web models && cp resources.json vendor/imgly-data/ && cp -r node_modules/onnxruntime-web/dist/* onnxruntime-web/ && cp node_modules/@imgly/background-removal-data/dist/resources.json models/ && cp node_modules/@imgly/background-removal-data/dist/[0-9a-f]* models/
